    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Residencia(java.lang.String nombre, Habitacion[] habitaciones)
      Class constructor.- Request a new residence It generates a new residence, which will have a array of objects "Room", an array of objects "Resident" and an array of objects "Reserve".

                    Habitacion h,
                    java.util.Date entrada,
                    java.util.Date salida)
        Public method "ingreso" that makes the resident's entry into the room assigned on arrival date and up to the departure
        Parameters:
        r - Resident to enter
        h - room Selected
        entrada - Date of entry
        salida - Departure date

      • cambiarHabitacion

        public void cambiarHabitacion(Residente r,
                              Habitacion h,
                              java.util.Date entrada,
                              java.util.Date salida)
        Public method "cambiarHabitacion" if a resident requests changing room, made the adjustment method, for it is taken into account if the departure has not yet happened. Then a new reservation for the resident, with the new room, the entry (no change) and the new departure is generated (if necessary, is changed)
        Parameters:
        r - Resident who requested room change
        h - Room chosen by the resident
        entrada - new Check In
        salida - new Check Out

      • salida

        public void salida(Residente r,
                   java.util.Date salida)
        Out of a resident. If a resident requests exit before completing the reservation system gives check out
        Parameters:
        r - Resident output
        salida - new Check Out
